mapper.select: SELECT pkg.package_id, pkg.regular_price, prd.wine_id, prd.supplier_id, win.wine_name_eng, win.wine_name_chs, win.wine_name_cht, winry.winery_id, winry.winery_name_eng, winry.logo_img_id AS winery_logo_id, org.region_name_eng, org.region_name_chs, org.region_name_cht, ctry.country_name_eng, ctry.country_name_chs, ctry.country_name_cht, winvtg.vintage_tag, winvtg.vintage_name, win.wine_img_id FROM t_package pkg INNER JOIN t_product prd ON pkg.product_id = prd.product_id INNER JOIN t_wine_vintage winvtg ON prd.wine_id = winvtg.wine_id AND prd.vintage_tag = winvtg.vintage_tag INNER JOIN t_wine win ON prd.wine_id = win.wine_id LEFT JOIN t_winery winry ON win.winery_id = winry.winery_id LEFT JOIN t_origin org ON win.wine_origin_id = org.wine_origin_id LEFT JOIN t_country ctry ON org.country_id = ctry.country_id WHERE prd.is_recommend = 1 AND prd.supplier_id = #{supplierId}

SELECT pkg.package_id, pkg.regular_price, prd.wine_id, prd.supplier_id, win.wine_name_eng, win.wine_name_chs, win.wine_name_cht, winry.winery_id, winry.winery_name_eng, winry.logo_img_id AS winery_logo_id, org.region_name_eng, org.region_name_chs, org.region_name_cht, ctry.country_name_eng, ctry.country_name_chs, ctry.country_name_cht, winvtg.vintage_tag, winvtg.vintage_name, win.wine_img_id FROM t_package pkg INNER JOIN t_food_package fpkg ON pkg.package_id = fpkg.package_id INNER JOIN t_product prd ON pkg.product_id = prd.product_id INNER JOIN t_wine_vintage winvtg ON prd.wine_id = winvtg.wine_id AND prd.vintage_tag = winvtg.vintage_tag INNER JOIN t_wine win ON prd.wine_id = win.wine_id LEFT JOIN t_winery winry ON win.winery_id = winry.winery_id LEFT JOIN t_origin org ON win.wine_origin_id = org.wine_origin_id LEFT JOIN t_country ctry ON org.country_id = ctry.country_id WHERE fpkg.food_id = #{foodId}

SELECT pkg.package_id, pkg.regular_price, pkg.glass_price, prd.wine_id, prd.supplier_id, win.wine_name_eng, win.wine_name_chs, win.wine_name_cht, wintype.wine_type_name_eng, winry.winery_id, winry.winery_name_eng, winry.logo_img_id AS winery_logo_id, org.region_name_eng, org.region_name_chs, org.region_name_cht, ctry.country_name_eng, ctry.country_name_chs, ctry.country_name_cht, winvtg.vintage_tag, winvtg.vintage_name, win.wine_img_id FROM t_package pkg INNER JOIN t_product prd ON pkg.product_id = prd.product_id INNER JOIN t_wine_vintage winvtg ON prd.wine_id = winvtg.wine_id AND prd.vintage_tag = winvtg.vintage_tag INNER JOIN t_wine win ON prd.wine_id = win.wine_id INNER JOIN t_wine_type wintype ON win.wine_type_id = wintype.wine_type_id LEFT JOIN t_winery winry ON win.winery_id = winry.winery_id LEFT JOIN t_origin org ON win.wine_origin_id = org.wine_origin_id LEFT JOIN t_country ctry ON org.country_id = ctry.country_id WHERE pkg.package_id IN
#{packageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT max( a.regular_price ) AS minPackagePrice, max( a.regular_price ) AS maxPackagePrice FROM t_package a INNER JOIN t_product b ON a.product_id = b.product_id WHERE b.supplier_id = #{supplierId}

SELECT DISTINCT pkg.package_id, prd.supplier_id, wine.wine_id, wine.wine_img_id, wty.wine_type_name_eng, wny.winery_name_eng, vtg.vintage_tag, vtg.vintage_name, vtg.tasting_note, cty.country_name_eng, ori.region_name_eng, vtg.alcohol_bps, pkg.regular_price, pkg.glass_price, wine.wine_name_eng, wny.note_plain_eng, wny.about_url AS winery_about_url, wny.logo_img_id AS winery_logo_id, wny.banner_img_id, wny.winery_img_ids FROM t_package pkg INNER JOIN t_product prd ON prd.product_id = pkg.product_id INNER JOIN t_wine_vintage vtg ON prd.wine_id = vtg.wine_id AND prd.vintage_tag = vtg.vintage_tag INNER JOIN t_wine wine ON prd.wine_id = wine.wine_id LEFT JOIN t_wine_type wty ON wine.wine_type_id = wty.wine_type_id LEFT JOIN t_origin ori ON wine.wine_origin_id = ori.wine_origin_id LEFT JOIN t_country cty ON ori.country_id = cty.country_id LEFT JOIN t_winery wny ON wine.winery_id = wny.winery_id WHERE pkg.package_id = #{packageId}

select
from t_package where product_id in (select product_id from t_product where wine_id = #{wineId}) limit 1

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT prd.product_id) FROM t_product prd LEFT JOIN t_wine_vintage wvtg ON prd.wine_id = wvtg.wine_id AND prd.vintage_tag = wvtg.vintage_tag INNER JOIN t_wine win ON prd.wine_id = win.wine_id INNER JOIN t_origin org ON win.wine_origin_id = org.wine_origin_id LEFT JOIN t_country ctry ON org.country_id = ctry.country_id LEFT JOIN t_wine_type wtype ON win.wine_type_id = wtype.wine_type_id LEFT JOIN t_winery wry ON win.winery_id = wry.winery_id

SELECT DISTINCT prd.product_id, wvtg.vintage_tag, wvtg.vintage_name, win.wine_id, win.wine_name_eng AS wine_name, wvtg.is_organic_wine, prd.is_recommend, win.wine_type_id, wtype.wine_type_name_eng AS wine_type_name, win.wine_origin_id, org.region_name_eng AS wine_origin_name, org.country_id, ctry.country_name_eng AS country_name, win.winery_id, wry.winery_name_eng AS winery_name, win.wine_img_id, win.updated_at FROM t_product prd LEFT JOIN t_wine_vintage wvtg ON prd.wine_id = wvtg.wine_id AND prd.vintage_tag = wvtg.vintage_tag INNER JOIN t_wine win ON prd.wine_id = win.wine_id INNER JOIN t_origin org ON win.wine_origin_id = org.wine_origin_id LEFT JOIN t_country ctry ON org.country_id = ctry.country_id LEFT JOIN t_wine_type wtype ON win.wine_type_id = wtype.wine_type_id LEFT JOIN t_winery wry ON win.winery_id = wry.winery_id
limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
